query: commercial invoice date should be less than the issue date of bill of lading
destination_statement: Issue date of bill of lading
second_statement: Issue date of bill of lading

variations.variation: The issue date of bill of lading should not exceed [insert timeframe] from the shipment date.
The bill of lading's issuance date must be within [insert timeframe] of the shipment date.
The validity period of the bill of lading cannot surpass [insert timeframe] after the goods are shipped.
The bill of lading's issue should be no later than [insert timeframe] from the shipment date.
The maximum validity duration for the bill of lading is [insert timeframe] from the date of dispatch.
